description:
TVN Player is a VOD service from one of Poland's largest private TV stations.

This is an updated version of Brs TVN Player plugin.

For more information visit http://player.pl/
author: Brs, pisek
title: TVN Player 2
synopsis: TVN Player is a VOD service from one of Poland's largest private TV stations. This is an updated version of Brs TVN Player plugin.
